title: InstantiateMsg
description: This structure holds the parameters used for creating a Governance contract.

mbrn_staking_contract_addr.description: MBRN Staking contract to query MBRN denom

proposal_required_threshold.description: Proposal required threshold for executable proposals

vesting_voting_power_multiplier.description: Multiplier for vesting allocation voting power

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
